column4: how can i remove folder groups in alacarte? delete them i mean
select the parent folder on the left side
then you can delete (or hide, in older versions) the folders
i am supposed to be able to delete, but it isn't clickable. I can delete folders i have created, but how can i delete other ones?
how would i update my version? Im using dapper, and I am waiting for feisty.
the newer versions are apart of the GNOME releases
No, GNOME is most of the software that runs your desktop :)
you need to upgrade to edgy or feisty
oh, when is feisty officially out?
will i be able to upgrade from dapper?
only if you upgrade to edgy first
that sounds hard, wouldn't it be just as easy to download fiesty and fresh install?
thats what I will do then!!! Thanks.
well the upgrade it automated but it uses a lot of bandwidth and can cause problems, especially if you use 3rd party repos or automatix
